title: IVIEW Highlights the Current Global Trends in Technology for 2015 where Desktops and Laptops are Replaced by Affordable Windows Tablets
text:
Small and medium businesses today have seen the value and convenience of using windows tablet in improving their bottom line rather than using desktops and laptops in completing workloads. Aside from the fact that it provides them huge cut on the overhead cost where it became one of the reasons why companies refuse to give increase to their employees, it makes the work more flexible and hassle-free. Through affordable windows tablet which has the same features as of desktops and laptops, doing business is much easier because this can be done anywhere, anytime as long as there’s 4G connection.
The warm welcome of many small and medium enterprises towards windows tablet is apparent on the number of shipments happening every minute of the day. It was noted that PC shipments in the recent years continuously show a great decline with some businesses still stuck with Windows PC upgrades, which alone is costly. With all these factors that could be financially unhealthy for small and medium businesses, the eagerness to make a tremendous changes on how businesses take their ventures with seriousness, have landed to the way how they will accomplish their workloads where both employers and employees will be in win-win sides – and that is switching from desktops to tablets.
This technological revolution happening in the workplace, in fact, is the current trend in various small and medium businesses in the UK where workers are abandoning their PCs and laptops in favor of windows table t. Based on the surveys, it was found that 31% of businesses are in the process of replacing their PCs with tablets, while 24% of the businesses who participated the survey have already made the transition for the reason that it allows people to work more flexibly compared to PCs.
With tablet computers , they can use a mouse, a standalone keyboard, and a portable screen when they are at the workplace. And if for instance they have to go on a business trip abroad, they can still get in touch with the current progress of their work while traveling as long as they have a 4G connection. According to some businesses that are already using tablet computers as part of their daily workflow, they are not constrained by large Windows desktop estates which make it easier for them to use other business software.
And with the sudden changes on how small and medium businesses integrate technology in their workplace, tablets and smartphones continuously dominate the sales in the consumer market because they have found the convenience and flexibility on these devices. Thus, it is expected that in the coming years, tablets and other mobile devices will constantly top the chart because of the ongoing transition happening on small and medium businesses alone.
